text: @BumbleBeeszy Given how he has and is handling the CoVID-19 situation only? I would vote for @MassGovernor . I’m not to keen on some of the handling of the MBTA issues and some other policies, but just based on the work he’s done during the pandemic? Yes. I would vote for him again.
